Title: Requires persons prescribing or dispensing opioids to counsel patients about the potential addictive properties of opioids
Summary: Requires practitioners to provide counselling to patients about the potential addictive properties of opioids prior to prescribing such medications; requires pharmacists to provide counselling to patients about the potential addictive properties of opioids at the time a prescription for opioids is filled.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring persons prescribing or dispensing opioids to counsel patients about the potential addictive properties of opioids
